description: April 2020-I really love this game.  It plays great as a solo game!So I figured I would try the solo game out as a couple years ago I played it as a multiplayer and felt it was too chaotic. Most of the time I didn’t know what that the hell was going on.  And I am not sure the people I learned it from were gifted at teaching games.  But anyways it has been a couple years and I figured I would see if it was as good of a solo game as I had heard. Truly great puzzle.  The manual is crap.  You should check this link out if you want to learn the game, really great work.  https://boardgamegeek.com/thread/2141334/teaching-spirit-isl...September 2019$46.74 BoardGameCo

title: Fabulous brain melting cooperative fun
description: Just don't play at 4p, when game time falls off a cliff
